content: “Knowledge is worthless unless it is applied” Why does knowledge must be useful? Is there someone who push us to doing so? And why did he/she/it push us? More over, the definition of success and doing a useful thing is different from one person to another. Success is not just being useful, success is happiness, if you feel happy by just learning thing, then you are success. Don’t push yourself if you don’t want to, enjoy your life, our life is just a tiny bit of billion years of earth’s life. Overall, it’s a nice one.
